Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled "Explore your accessibility options".

City Commission

Members

The Brownsville City Commission is comprised of seven members made up of the Mayor and six City Commissioners. You can write to your Mayor and Commissioner at: P.O. Box 911, Brownsville, Texas 78520. 

The City Commission meets at the City Commission Chambers located at City Hall/Old Federal Building, 2nd Floor, 1001 E. Elizabeth St., Brownsville, TX 78520

  1. John Cowen, Jr.

    Mayor
    John.Cowen@brownsvilletx.gov
    Phone: 956-548-6007

    1001 E. Elizabeth Street
    Brownsville, TX  78520

    • Elected:  May 6, 2023
    • Sworn In: May 16, 2023
    • Term Expires: May 2027

Additional Information

 

Special meetings or workshops may be called by the City Commission as needed. For further information contact us at 956-548-6042.

Regular Meetings

  • 5 p.m.
  • 1st and 3rd Tuesday of each month
  • City Hall / Federal Building
    1001 E Elizabeth Street
    Commission Chambers, 2nd Floor
    Brownsville, TX 78520

The Office of the City Secretary coordinates Brownsville City Commission meetings.

Agendas & Minutes

Agendas are available before the meetings.  Minutes are available following approval.

View Most Recent Agendas and Minutes.

The office of the City Secretary prepares agendas, meeting packets, and approved minutes.

City Commission agendas are posted on the City's website on the afternoon of the Friday prior to the scheduled Tuesday meeting.
